mean_cn: n. 分歧，意见不合，争执，争论，不同，差异
mean_en: a difference of opinion :an argument caused by people having different opinions about something
word_etyma: dis否定 + agree赞同 + ment名词后缀 → disagreement 分歧
short_phrase: break up because of a big disagreement
sentence: They had a disagreement about what to build with their toys.
sentence_trans: 他们对用这些积木造什么产生了分歧。
